title: aruL puri murugA
sahitya:
aruL puri murugA aravaNaitt-anbuDan sharaNam aDaiyum en sankaTam nInga nI


anupallavi

  karuNai koNDu un kazhalaDi tozhuvOrai kAttu aruL kUrum kIrtimAnE


caraNam    shankaranAr iDam sharaNamAna surar sankaTam tIrttiDa gangaiyil udittOnE
engum mEnmEl pongu munnaruLil pangaDiyEnukkum pAnguDan Indu
